comments:
Works for me using R3.0 (I get a dialog).

If this does not work for you using R3.0 or newer then please reopen after
attaching the following information:

Which build are you using?
What is active (editor, Outline view, Package Explorer)?
From where (main menu, context menu) do you execute Source > Generate
Constructor...?
Is anything in .log

I'm using Eclipse 3.0 final build 200406251208

Of course, I'm calling it from a Java editor.  I call it from the main menu.

Here it is what appears in the log.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 jul 09, 2004 10:10:54.343

You get a java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError which looks like some installation
problem. Maybe you unzipped 3.0 over an existing install or modified the
configuration manually.

Please reopen if you see this using fresh R3.0 or newer install unzipped into an
empty directory.
